code:
flowchart TB
    %% Styles for different eras
    classDef twoStage fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef oneStage fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef anchorFree fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef transformer fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef timeline stroke:#000,stroke-width:1px
    classDef timelineMarker stroke:#000,stroke-width:1px,stroke-dasharray: 5 5
    
    %% Era headers (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Era1[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::twoStage
    Era2[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::oneStage
    Era3[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::anchorFree
    Era4[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    
    %% Year labels (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    Y2014[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::twoStage
    Y2015[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::twoStage
    Y2016[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::oneStage
    Y2017[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::oneStage
    Y2018[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::anchorFree
    Y2019[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::anchorFree
    Y2020[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    Y2021[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::transformer
    Y2022[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::transformer
    Y2023[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    Y2024[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    
    %% Era to Year connections
    Era1 --- Y2014 & Y2015 & Y2016
    Era2 --- Y2016 & Y2017 & Y2018
    Era3 --- Y2018 & Y2019 & Y2020
    Era4 --- Y2020 & Y2021 & Y2022 & Y2023 & Y2024
    
    %% Timeline with markers
    TL1 --- TL2 --- TL3 --- TL4 --- TL5 --- TL6 --- TL7 --- TL8 --- TL9 --- TL10 --- TL11
    TL1 & TL2 & TL3 & TL4 & TL5 & TL6 & TL7 & TL8 & TL9 & TL10 & TL11:::timeline
    
    %% Timeline markers to years
    Y2014 -.- TL1:::timelineMarker
    Y2015 -.- TL2:::timelineMarker
    Y2016 -.- TL3:::timelineMarker
    Y2017 -.- TL4:::timelineMarker
    Y2018 -.- TL5:::timelineMarker
    Y2019 -.- TL6:::timelineMarker
    Y2020 -.- TL7:::timelineMarker
    Y2021 -.- TL8:::timelineMarker
    Y2022 -.- TL9:::timelineMarker
    Y2023 -.- TL10:::timelineMarker
    Y2024 -.- TL11:::timelineMarker
    
    %% Primary Models (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    RCNN[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::twoStage
    FasterRCNN[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::twoStage
    YOLO1[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::oneStage
    RetinaNet[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::oneStage
    CornerNet[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::anchorFree
    CenterNet[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::anchorFree
    DETR[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    DefDETR[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    YOLO7[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    CLIPDET[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::transformer
    YOLO11[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::transformer
    
    %% Timeline to Models connections
    TL1 -.- RCNN
    TL2 -.- FasterRCNN
    TL3 -.- YOLO1
    TL4 -.- RetinaNet
    TL5 -.- CornerNet
    TL6 -.- CenterNet
    TL7 -.- DETR
    TL8 -.- DefDETR
    TL9 -.- YOLO7
    TL10 -.- CLIPDET
    TL11 -.- YOLO11
    
    %% Key contributions (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    RCNNContrib[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::twoStage
    FasterRCNNContrib[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::twoStage
    YOLO1Contrib[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::oneStage
    RetinaNetContrib[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::oneStage
    CornerNetContrib[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::anchorFree
    CenterNetContrib[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::anchorFree
    DETRContrib[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    DefDETRContrib[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::transformer
    YOLO7Contrib[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::transformer
    CLIPDETContrib[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    YOLO11Contrib[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    
    %% Models to contributions connections
    RCNN --- RCNNContrib
    FasterRCNN --- FasterRCNNContrib
    YOLO1 --- YOLO1Contrib
    RetinaNet --- RetinaNetContrib
    CornerNet --- CornerNetContrib
    CenterNet --- CenterNetContrib
    DETR --- DETRContrib
    DefDETR --- DefDETRContrib
    YOLO7 --- YOLO7Contrib
    CLIPDET --- CLIPDETContrib
    YOLO11 --- YOLO11Contrib
    
    %% Secondary models (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    FastRCNN[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::twoStage
    SSD[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::oneStage
    FCOS[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::anchorFree
    RTDETR[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::transformer
    YOLO8[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::transformer
    YOLO9[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::transformer
    YOLO10[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    
    %% Secondary model contributions
    FastRCNNContrib[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]:::twoStage
    SSDContrib[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::oneStage
    FCOSContrib[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]:::anchorFree
    RTDETRContrib[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer
    YOLO8Contrib[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]:::transformer
    YOLO9SecContrib[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]:::transformer
    YOLO10Contrib[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]:::transformer

    %% Secondary model connections
    FasterRCNN -.- FastRCNN
    FastRCNN --- FastRCNNContrib
    YOLO1 -.- SSD
    SSD --- SSDContrib
    CenterNet -.- FCOS
    FCOS --- FCOSContrib
    DefDETR -.- RTDETR
    RTDETR --- RTDETRContrib
    YOLO7 -.- YOLO8
    YOLO8 --- YOLO8Contrib
    CLIPDET -.- YOLO9
    YOLO9 --- YOLO9SecContrib
    YOLO9 -.- YOLO10
    YOLO10 --- YOLO10Contrib
